properties.entry: SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , ADDRESS , P_CALL , P_SCORE , BUSINESSTIME , FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PLACE JOIN ATTECHMENT ON (P_NO = PLACE_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P_STATUS = 'Y' AND LOCATION_NO = ?

SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , ADDRESS , P_CALL , P_SCORE , BUSINESSTIME , FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PLACE JOIN ATTECHMENT ON (P_NO = PLACE_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P_STATUS = 'Y' AND RCATEGORY_NO = ? AND P_SELECT_NUM = 1

SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , ADDRESS , P_CALL , P_SCORE , BUSINESSTIME , FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PLACE JOIN ATTECHMENT ON (P_NO = PLACE_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P_STATUS = 'Y' AND P_SELECT_NUM = 1
